summary: The module defines automated tests for the Flux ControlNet diffusion pipeline, offering a fast test suite that uses mocked components to verify controlnet integration and attention forwarding, and a slower suite that runs full pipeline executions on Canny edge inputs to validate end‑to‑end behavior under deterministic and GPU‑dependent conditions.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness and stability of the Flux ControlNet pipeline within the diffusion library, enabling reliable releases and facilitating developer confidence in the model's controlnet and attention mechanisms.
